code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const flashcards=[{question:'What is the capital of France?',answer:'Paris'},{question:'What is the tallest mountain in the world?',answer:'Mount Everest'},{question:'Who wrote "Hamlet"?',answer:'William Shakespeare'},{question:'What is the speed of light?',answer:'299,792,458 meters per second'}];function App(){const[currentCard,setCurrentCard]=useState(0);const[showAnswer,setShowAnswer]=useState(false);const handleCardClick=()=>{setShowAnswer(!showAnswer);};const nextCard=()=>{setCurrentCard(prev=>(prev+1)%flashcards.length);setShowAnswer(false);};const prevCard=()=>{setCurrentCard(prev=>(prev-1+flashcards.length)%flashcards.length);setShowAnswer(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flashcard",onClick:handleCardClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:showAnswer?flashcards[currentCard].answer:flashcards[currentCard].question})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:prevCard,children:"Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:nextCard,children:"Next"})]})]});}export default App;
